cont.entity_a: The system is easy to use.

cont.entity_b: Brews enough for two cups quickly. The machine is loud during brewing.

cont.entity_a: The filter simplifies cleanup. Filter bags are recommended for easier cleanup.
The glass pitcher is thin and fragile.
The system doesn't come with a lid when purchased from Amazon.
cont.entity_b: The lid may warp over time, causing steam issues. The clock display is hard to read due to lack of backlight.

cont.entity_a: Coffee leaks during steeping due to stopper issues.
cont.entity_b: The decanter drips when pouring from a full pot.

cont.entity_a: Produces a strong coffee concentrate that lasts a week.
The cold brew has low acidity and a smooth taste.
The glass carafe is a good size for storage.
cont.entity_b: The machine is small and suitable for single servings.

cont.entity_a: The Toddy system is more efficient than other methods for making cold brew.

cont.entity_b: Compact and cost-effective compared to Keurig.
Keeps coffee warm for only an hour.
Programmable feature for delayed brewing is unreliable.
